name: Tarot Twist
description:
Created for the 2020 Yogscast Game Jam in GameMaker 2!

We were unable to complete the bug fixes before the deadline so uh... nothing quite works. enjoy the art and sound design? We still had a ton of fun making the game and we will continue to work on the concept after the jam.

Tarot Twist! 

A Strategy Card Game where the player is being read their future. But the fortune teller has some surprises up her sleeve. You have the chance to change your fate. Can you succeed? 

Alter your stats by drawing tarot cards to leave better off than you started.

Controls:

  • ESC to pause in game
  • Scroll wheel and click to move through Menu
  • Click with mouse to pick a card

Modifiers:

  • Pitch, Please - Make it a cardslinger
